ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: There is one danger to this.  If the mob dies while charmed you will get no exp and the corpse will poof. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
There is one danger to this. If the mob dies while charmed you will get no
exp and the corpse will poof.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 11:51 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
>
>
> It's not just our charms and DoT's fortunately. All spell
> effects that can
> be cast on an enemy mob remain on a charmed mob. In
> addition, all spell
> effects which can be cast on a pet mob remain when the mob
> uncharms. I
> first discovered it with my enchanter, but found my bard
> could do it as
> well.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 1:00 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Macros
>
>
> Really? Cripes, don't mention it on the EQ board...
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
> Gordon Hughes wrote:
>
> > >
> > Yep the Chant still has full effect on the charmed mob.
> They basically
> just
> > sit there and wait to die.
> > >
> >
> > Gosh!
> >
> > /em slowly forms an eeeeveeel grin.
> >
